text: Stopover Tokyo is a 1957 American Japanese mystery movie directed by Richard L. Breen and based on the novel of the same name by John P. Marquand. It stars Robert Wagner, Joan Collins, Edmond O'Brien, Ken Scott, Larry Keating and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1957 movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Japanese mystery movies Category:1950s mystery movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in Tokyo
title: Stopover Tokyo
